creature

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • creature.Creature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventObject, Round
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animal, Person

    public abstract class Creature
extends java.lang.Object
implements Round, EventObject
    Abstract class for creatures.
